divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside watering my trees, walking back inside my house I noticed in the southeastern sky what looked like a floating black circle object. The sphere had a bright white light in the center and red light spinning around. Stopping to watch, I noticed it moved closer making no sound and moved slowly to the northeast. The object seemed to move back and forth. I watched it till I could no longer see it to the east. I have no idea what this could have been; I even called my girlfriend and son out to see it and they were not sure either.
Summary: Black circle with bright white light in center and red light spinning around.
trends: There have been 23 other sightings in Palm Springs
There were no other sightings in Palm Springs on or around September 2nd 2008
